keywords.description: 触发摄影师模式的关键词列表

char_identity.hint:
只填写描述内容，无需Markdown标题。默认值：
> The subject is a young 18-year-old Asian girl...

* **面部:** 18岁，娃娃脸...
* **头发:** 粉棕色...

env_default.description: 环境 A: 卧室 (Prompt Block Only)
env_default.hint:
只填写Prompt标签。默认值：
(indoors, cute girl's bedroom aesthetic:1.3), (kawaii style:1.2), (natural window light mixed with warm indoor lamps:1.3)...

env_fullbody.description: 环境 B: 更衣室 (Prompt Block Only)
env_fullbody.hint:
只填写Prompt标签。默认值：
(indoors, pink aesthetic dressing room:1.4), (bright sunlight streaming through sheer curtains:1.4)...

env_outdoor.description: 环境 C: 户外 (Instruction Only)
env_outdoor.hint:
只填写指令。默认值：
Remove indoor description, use user specified scene, force add `(blurred background), (bokeh), (natural lighting)`.

cam_selfie.description: 镜头 A: 自拍 (Params Only)
cam_selfie.hint:
只填写镜头参数。默认值：
, (mirror selfie style:1.2), holding phone, looking at phone screen or mirror...

cam_fullbody.description: 镜头 B: 全身 (Params Only)
cam_fullbody.hint:
只填写镜头参数。默认值：
, full body shot, showing entire figure from head to toe, wide angle lens...
